meanings.definition: The number that is one more than thirteen.
meanings.sent1: I counted up to fourteen candies in the jar.
meanings.sent2: There are fourteen students in our class.
meanings.sent3: Why did the baker only bake fourteen cookies? Because he ran out of flour!
meanings.sent4: Her smile lit up the room like a bouquet of fourteen sunflowers.
meanings.sent5: The sound of fourteen bells ringing filled the air with joy.

meanings.definition: A group or set of fourteen people or things.
meanings.sent1: The basketball team consisted of fourteen players.
meanings.sent2: There were fourteen cupcakes on the dessert table.
meanings.sent3: The zoo had exactly fourteen penguins waddling around.
meanings.sent4: The garden was adorned with fourteen colorful tulips.
meanings.sent5: Fourteen stars shone brightly in the night sky.
